title: To-Do List
description: Using Python and the Tkinter library, this application allows users to efficiently manage their tasks, providing a seamless and interactive experience for organizing daily activities with ease.

title: Weather App
description: The user-friendly interface allows for interactive exploration of current conditions and forecasts, offering an engaging and informative experience using an API.

title: MenuMaster
description: A program that dynamically manipulates collections, featuring a user-friendly menu to explore restaurant data, including reservations and patrons.
